title: European allies defend Syria strikes
text:
European allies defend Syria strikes 3:57pm BST - 01:31 
U.S. President Donald Trump announced the military action in Syria, but French and British warplanes played a key role in the strikes early on Saturday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump announced the military action in Syria, but French and British warplanes played a key role in the strikes early on Saturday.
